name: Chiffa 2
summary: The Fox's best friend has been kidnapped. The Fox leaves his home behind to embark on an adventure which brings him in contact with a lot of forest creatures. On his way, the Fox searches for hidden objects that can be used to complete quests. While looking for his friend Chicken, the brave Fox deals with dangerous situations where terrifying creatures threaten to eat him alive! To save the Chicken the Fox has to defeat the wicked Wolf.
